item.title: earthquake forecast
item.description: How to achieve earthquake forecasts? Earthquake weather? Earthquake climate? What do we need to do next? Physics-based models capable of [[notes/data assimilation|data assimilation]] good approximation of the physics we want to model upscaling?

item.title: Better built environments
item.description: What are built environments from the Wiki Build the built environment in a less intrusive way 鋼構攔砂壩 穿透式的鋼構壩，在不妨礙生態系運作的情況下，達到避災減災的目的。「降雨將上游的土砂往下游帶，達到補充海岸泥沙，原是自然運作的法則。」許文奕說，而穿透式的壩體，就可讓顆粒較小、沖刷力道相對小的砂石往下游帶。 Biodiverse Gardens 你敢知影阮ㄟ名？臺灣原生野花草化身「野花園」主角 Copper mining directly from brine instead of digging it From the Economist

item.title: Consume for the greatest good
item.description: Best: not buying anything at all Then: define the greatest good Case: which one is better? Natural material shoes or vegan synthetic shoes?

item.title: data assimilation
item.description: Links:: [[notes/prj-eqsim]] Calibrate numerical model using the observed values. Inspiration [[Ylona van Dinther|Ylona van Dinther]], Hans R Künsch, Andreas Fichtner, Ensemble data assimilation for earthquake sequences: probabilistic estimation and forecasting of fault stresses, Geophysical Journal International, Volume 217, Issue 3, June 2019, Pages 1453–1478, doi: 10.

item.title: Detective work for the environment
item.description: A career like this seems nice? MOC [[notes/Soya and beef industry in Brazil]] [[notes/Consume for the greatest good]]

item.title: modeling earthquakes
item.description: Modeling seismicity using statistical distributions [[notes/ETAS|ETAS]] Modeling seismicity using fixed faults Discrete earthquake simulators RSQSim from [[notes/James H Dieterich|JH Dieterich]] and KB Richards-Dinger Dynamic rupture models LMU group [[notes/SEAS|SEAS]] benchmarks Single-fault multiple earthquake cycle Rheology and frictional properties studies Modeling seismicity in the continuum regime See the publications from Taras Gerya group: Luca dal Zilio, [[Ylona van Dinther|Ylona van Dinther]] Still in 2-D megathrusts

item.title: My Hero Academics
item.description: Self-promotion is something I struggle with for as long as I have memories. Imagine how bad I usually feel in a conference.

item.title: Open science
item.description: Back when I started the [[notes/prj-eqsim|fault system simulations]] as one of the PhD projects, there are not many open-sourced tools to start from.

item.title: Publicly Clueless
item.description: I am a person that does not like writing and doesn’t write well. Of all the research works my least favorite is writing.

item.title: Simulation Science
item.description: Choosing a model is the same as choosing a base functions. It’s the wavelength you choose to observe and describe the phenomena.

item.title: Strain rate to Seismicity Rate
item.description: Does the rate of surface deformation proportional to the rate of earthquakes? Can change in strain rate translate to change in seismicity rate?
